description:
Everyone loves a good word search & we are ready to bring the classic game to your Palm Pre and Pixi.  Word Search is a great time waster for the kids on a long drive or a distraction for you during a boring meeting.  
The full version features more than 20 categories and more than 5000 words to search for. Lite version has 3. Each puzzle is uniquely generated from our large vocabulary list so you can play it over and over again. 
To customize the game you can choose from various sized puzzles from a light 10x10 to a whopping 25x25 sized puzzle.  Want to make it easier? Make it only Up and Across. Want to make it more challenging? Choose diagonal and backwards only. English words a breeze? Try our Japanese Hiragana or Greek puzzle on for size. We even feature French and Spanish vocabulary.
You can use the WebOS pinch gesture to resize the screen to make it easier to find and select words. You can also resize using the handy ‘.’  and ‘,’ keys on the keyboard. 
Save your games and play them later. Word Search by Invasive Bamboo has it all.
Invasive Bamboo is committed to updating the categories and adding fresh word lists periodically. 
Fall in love with your Pre or Pixi all over again! Play Word Search today!
Palm Pre and Pixi tested.
